X-Ray tracing is automatically enabled a: X-Ray tracing is automatically enabled at the CDK level for Lambda functions and API Gateway. SDK-level instrumentation with `aws-xray-sdk` is optional for additional tracing capabilities.

The framework includes support for AWS S: The framework includes support for AWS Step Functions Local, allowing you to test and debug Step Functions workflows in your local development environment.
Step Functions Local runs as a Docker co: Step Functions Local runs as a Docker container alongside other local services:

The Step Functions Local service runs on: The Step Functions Local service runs on port 8083 and connects to your local Lambda functions.

Version conflicts occur when multiple pr: Version conflicts occur when multiple processes attempt to update the same item simultaneously. The framework uses optimistic locking to ensure data consistency.
In MBC CQRS Serverless, version manageme: In MBC CQRS Serverless, version management works as follows:

The command table stores a complete hist: The command table stores a complete history of all commands, enabling full audit trails and debugging.
